patthana18.25:1.1: Saraṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.25:2.1: Araṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.25:3.1: Saraṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.25:4.1: Araṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.25:5.1: Saraṇaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.25:6.1: Araṇaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā dve …pe… sahajāte cattāri, aññamaññe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.25:7.1: Saraṇaṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.25:8.1: Araṇaṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.25:9.1: Saraṇaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. Araṇaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana18.25:10.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā dve …pe… sahajāte cattāri, aññamaññe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri. (Sahetukadukasadisaṃ.)
patthana18.25:11.1: Saraṇaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.25:12.1: Araṇaṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.25:13.1: Saraṇaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.25:14.1: Araṇaṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.25:15.1: Saraṇaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Hetusahetukadukasadisaṃ.)
patthana18.25:16.1: Saraṇaṃ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.25:17.1: Araṇaṃ nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.25:18.1: Araṇaṃ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
